name: Weakify
summary: A set of functions that allow you to weakly apply an object to a method so that it can be used without causing memory leaks.
description: Weakify is a Âµframework providing some commonly useful variations of the weakify() function. weakify() is primarily a way to be able to use a method on a class as a closure value that would be managed by some other component, but in a way that prevents memory leaks from occurring.
